description:
Goone is an employee of the Kodai Network and he is Grings Kodai`s bodyguard. He was the one that introduced Rowena to Grings Kodai but Grings Kodai had a vision that she would be one of the people that would betray him while attempting to capture the second ripple of time energy. Goone was unaware that Rowena would betray them in the end.
Goone helped Grings Kodai carry out his goals and ambitions to further expand the wealth of the Kodai Network. Goone unfortunately let Zorua escape at they were arriving in Crown City but Grings Kodai wasn`t too concerned. Goone had a bunch of Scizor and Ninjask that helped him enforce their tasks. He was eventually found out to have willingly helped Grings Kodai and was sent to jail.
name: Goon
